theme: ‚è∞ Mastering the Art of Time Management

questions.question: To manage two or more responsibilities or tasks at the same time.
To delay doing something until later.
To reserve time or resources for a specific activity.
To have no time remaining to complete something.
To make time for something despite being busy.
The act of intentionally delaying a task or decision.
To decide what tasks should be done first based on importance.
The ability to complete tasks with little or no waste of time or resources.
Duties or tasks one is required or expected to do.
To complete a task just before the deadline.
Used to say time is passing very quickly.
To arrive or complete something just before it is too late.
To do something at the very last moment possible.
